#



##



###

```kotlin
implementation("software.momento.java:sdk:1.0.0")
```

###

```xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>software.momento.java</groupId>
    <artifactId>sdk</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
```

##



    export MOMENTO_API_KEY=<your Momento API key here>
